item.title: Semicolon (';') expected in script, help =/
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Very well said Freddy, SRL is a great include but its making things too easy, I mean someone completely new could just make an autofighter in 5 lines but as soon as something goes wrong they’d be dumstruck because they never learnt how everything works

item.title: Semicolon (';') expected in script, help =/
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

He needs to get srl first ey
And that is rly wrong, the idea is learning to script, you can make an autofighter with srl in 5 lines, but thats not scripting anymore, thats just all prescripted stuff, nothing to do yourself and that way you can’t learn anything from it, i can just go trough the script section and improving peoples scripts, but they need to learn as well as i did once, and by doing it for them your not helping
I think fooktard here is doing a very good job, he is learning how to script and he is asking help when he needs it, but not asking to do it for him

Read full topic

item.title: Semicolon (';') expected in script, help =/
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

Try putting {.include SRL\SRL.scar} at the top, then replace:
[scar]SendKeysSilent(‘Selling ’ + Sell + ’ pure rune essance, 70gp each!’ + Chr(13));[/scar]
with:
[scar]sendtext(‘Selling ’ + Sell + ’ pure rune essance, 70gp each!’ + Chr(13));[/scar]
That will type like a human.

Read full topic

item.title: Semicolon (';') expected in script, help =/
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

this is gonna take a sec to fix, that semicolon is the least of ur problems =S
EDIT:
[scar]// Garys script for selling the essence he’s autoed
// by gary

program setupspeed;

const
WaitTime = 3000; //time inbetween typing

var
Sell: String;

procedure BeginInScript;
begin
Sell := ReadLn(‘How much essence are you selling?’);
Wait(500)
WriteLn(‘starting script in…’);
Wait(1000);
WriteLn(‘5’);
Wait(1000);
WriteLn(‘4’);
Wait(1000);
WriteLn(‘3’);
Wait(1000);
WriteLn(‘2’);
Wait(1000);
WriteLn(‘1’);
Wait(1000);
WriteLn(‘0’);
end;

procedure Spamming;
begin
Wait(WaitTime);
SendKeysSilent(‘Selling ’ + Sell + ’ pure rune essance, 70gp each!’ + Chr(13));
end;

begin
BeginInScript;
repeat
Spamming;
until False;
end.[/scar]
There you go

Read full topic

item.title: Semicolon (';') expected in script, help =/
item.dc:creator: @fooktard fooktard
item.description:
@fooktard wrote:

ive a scripting newbie as you can probably tell :|, ive been getting the error above in this script and i dont know why, theres nothing wrong with the script as far as i can see.

can someone help? (script is below)

[code]// Garys script for selling the essence he’s autoed
// by gary

program setupspeed;

const
waittime = 3000 //time inbetween typing

program begininscript;
var
whaturselling: string;
begin
sell :=readln(‘how much essence are you selling?’);
wait(500)
writeln(‘starting script in…’);
wait(1000)
writeln(‘5’);
wait(1000)
writeln(‘4’);
wait(1000)
writeln(‘3’);
wait(1000)
writeln(‘2’);
wait(1000)
writeln(‘1’);
wait(1000)
writeln(‘0’);
end;

program spamming;
begin
wait(waittime);
SendKeysSilent(‘selling’ + sell + ‘pure rune essance, 70gp each!’);
repeat

end.[/code]

Read full topic
